thread.title: BRIEF-Chengdu Guibao Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 50 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Guibao Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 30 pct to 50 pct

organizations.name: chengdu guibao science & technology co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Chengdu Guibao Science & Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 30 percent to 50 percent, or to be 45 million yuan to 63 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 90.6 million yuan
* Says price rise in raw materials is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/UeRD6z
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
